name: Config 2022 Name Badge - Przemysław Budziło
description:
Working (still) for Cinema City Poland as a Webmaster, Graphic designer, Video Editor & Plasm operator, but I wanted more. At first I interest only in UI (for many, many years), but at some point wanted to learn UX too at the same time. I feel like opening a bottomless bag of candies that I want to eat in order to discover new flavors. Creating content is my life... day without create somethink in digital world or real life (like cooking) is a lost day.


Starting thinking about create my own channel on YouTube... and fun by learning in showing :D
